item.description:
Hi, got this good idea from our last meetup where someone mention we can do a meeting where we pair up a native spanish speaker with a native english speaker and each party is forced to communicate to each other verbally only by the lang they are trying to improve (ie the spanish speaker will exclusively speak english and english speaker will only speak spanish)

 

The native speaker can use their own lang in correcting pronuciation / grammar etc.  Both speakers can also use writing to enhance the experience.

 

If we can get enough people - we can rotate the pairing every 30 mins to keep it fresh.

 

If we can get enough ppl / set on a preferred location - we can start repeating this one regularly

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Spanish - English Conversation Exchange
